channel.title: How do i make it so everyone is member?
channel.description:
In dodian there is a nonmember/member thing, how do i make it so even when a new player joins they are a member?
EDIT: also when a player yells, how do you make it so when it is a mod it says [MOD](username): and [ADMIN](username): ?

item.title: How do i make it so everyone is member?
item.dc:creator: @marc_is_hood marc is hood
item.description:
@marc_is_hood wrote:

Thanks
